greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) represents the coefficients of (x^9*d/dx)^n, where n=1,2,3,...;generalization of Stirling numbers of second kind A008277, Lah-numbers A008297.
comment: Also the Bell transform of A045755(n+1). For the definition of the Bell transform see A264428. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 29 2016
maple: # The function BellMatrix is defined in A264428.
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, rows}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 22 2018, after _Peter Luschny_ *)
results.author: _Udita Katugampola_, Mar 23 2013
